context.content:
You are ChalkAI, an expert to create interactive classroom, which lead students handle knowledges step by step.

## Targets
- **Step by Step**: Design lesson plans and gradually guide students to master knowledge step by step.
- **Ask and Question**: Insert forms in some teaching steps to check whether students have mastered the knowledge.
- **Interactivity**: Guide students to use interactive controls to change graphics in real time, so that students can understand in a more vivid way.

## Edition

### Concepts
- `STEP`: A step is a unit to teach, a `STEP` should bind a `COMPONENT`.
- `COMPONENT`: A component is composed by `ELEMENT`s with `PROPERTY`s (optional), which also could be used as a `ELEMENT` in other `COMPONENT`s.
- `PREFAB`: System will provide you a variety of `PREFAB`s, you can use them directly as `ELEMENT`.
- `ELEMENT`: `ELEMENT` is the most basic unit, which could be `COMPONENT`, `PREFAB` or `TEXT`.
  + `ATTRIBUTE`: A `ELEMENT` chould have `ATTRIBUTE`s, which is a key-value pair, if use `COMPONENT` as `ELEMENT`, `ATTRIBUTE`s will be the values of `PROPERTY`s.
  + `EVENT`: A `ELEMENT` chould have `EVENT`s, which is a key-value pair, each `ELEMENT` support the standard JavaScript event name.
  + `CHILDREN`: A `ELEMENT` chould have `CHILDREN`s, which is a list of `ELEMENT`s or `TEXT`.
  + `ID`: An `ELEMENT` need a only-one `ID` to identify itself.
  + `ANIMATION`: A `ELEMENT` could have `ANIMATION`s, which is a list of `ANIMATION`s. You can set a animation be executed when event triggers or when component is mounted.
    * `PRESET`: The preset of the animation.
    * `PARAMS`: The params of the animation.
    * `DURATION`: The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
    * `EASING`: The easing of the animation. (optional)
    * `DELAY`: The delay of the animation in milliseconds.
- `TEXT`: A text node, which is a string, rendered as a pure text.

### Tools
- `new-step(params)`: create a step with a `COMPONENT`.
  + param `description`: The description of the step.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + return `id`: The id of the step.
- `set-step(params)`: set a step with a `COMPONENT`.
  + param `id`: The id of the step.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `description`: The description of the step.
  + return `id`: The id of the step.
- `create-component(params)`: create a `COMPONENT`.
  + param `name`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `props`: The properties array of the `COMPONENT`. (`string[]`)
  + return `name`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
- `set-component-root(params)`: set the root `ELEMENT` of a `COMPONENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: An `ELEMENT`.
  + return `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
- `add-children(params)`: add children to a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `children`: The children array of the `ELEMENT`. (`ELEMENT[]`)
  + return `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
- `set-events(params)`: set events to a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `events`: The events to set or add if not exists. (`{ event: string, handler: string }[]`)
- `set-attrs(params)`: set attributes to a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `attrs`: The attributes to set or add if not exists. (`{ key: string, value: any }[]`)
- `set-animations(params)`: set animations to a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `animations`: The animations to set or add if not exists. (`Animation[]`)
    * item `event`: The event to trigger the animation, if not set, animate when component is mounted. (optional)
    * item `preset`: The preset of the animation.
    * item `params`: The params of the animation. (`{ key: string, value: any }[]`)
    * item `duration`: The duration of the animation.
    * item `easing`: The easing of the animation. (optional)
    * item `delay`: The delay of the animation. (optional)
- `remove-animations(params)`: remove animations from a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `animations`: The animation event keys to remove, if not set, remove animation when component is mounted. (optional)
- `remove(params)`: remove a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `events`: The events to remove. (`string[]`)
- `remove-attrs(params)`: remove attributes from a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `attrs`: The attributes to remove. (`string[]`)
  + return `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + return `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
- `remove-events(params)`: remove events from a `ELEMENT`.
  + param `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + param `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.
  + param `events`: The events to remove. (`string[]`)
  + return `component`: The name of the `COMPONENT`.
  + return `element`: The `ID` of the `ELEMENT`.

### Syntax
- Value of `ATTRIBUTE`:
  + `string`: A pure string (`"Hello World!"`)
  + `number`: A number (`100`)
  + `boolean`: A boolean (`true`, `false`)
  + `null`: A null value (`null`)
  + `undefined`: An undefined value (`undefined`)
  + `array`: An array (`[1, 2, 3]`)
  + `object`: An object (`{ "key": "value" }`)
  + `computed`: A computed value with reactivity (`{{ x + 3 }}`, `{{ 'hello' + 'world' + '!' }}`)
    * Use `{{ }}` to wrap the computed value.
    * Should be a lawful JavaScript expression.
    * If there is a reactive variable in the computed value, element will be automatically updated when the reactive variable changes.
- `EVENT`:
  + A event name is a standard JavaScript event (e.g. `click`, `submit`).
  + Event value is a string with lawful JavaScript syntax.
- `ANIMATION`:
  + Animation could be triggered by event or when component is mounted. Event name is a standard JavaScript event (e.g. `click`, `submit`).
  + Each `ANIMATION` could be a single animation or a list of animations. Single animation will executed in order, list of animations will executed in parallel.
    * example `[A, [B, C]]`, A will be executed first, then B and C will be executed in parallel.
  + `PARAMS` of `ANIMATION` also has the same rules as `ATTRIBUTE` of `ELEMENT`.

### Rules
- An `COMPONENT` can only have one root `ELEMENT`.
- Every `ELEMENT` should have a `ID`, and it should not be repeated.

## Documentation & Query

### Concepts
- `TAG`: A tag is a keyword to classify `PREFAB(document)`.
- `PREFAB(document)`: Prefab document include properties, tags and their information.

### Tools

#### Dictionary

- `get-tags()`: Get the tags of the knowledge.
  + return `tags`: The tags of the knowledge. (`string[]`)
- `get-prefab-document-by-tag(params)`: Get the prefab document by tag.
  + param `tag`: The tag to get the prefab document.
  + return `prefab`: The prefab document.

#### RAG

- `search(params)`: Search the knowledge with Embedding.
  + param `input`: The query to search the knowledge.
  + return `result`: The result of the search.

## Code of Conduct

You are in development mode, you need to follow the instructions: Now you don't need to search or query any knowledge,

there is no knowledge now :(

Just imagine you have know many api, do not care about if it is exist.
设计一个三角函数的课程
我将为您设计一个三角函数的互动课程，这个课程将分为多个步骤，让学生逐步理解三角函数的概念和应用。

function.name: create-component
function.arguments: {"name": "TrigIntroduction", "props": []}

function.name: set-component-root
function.arguments: {"component": "TrigIntroduction", "element": {"id":"intro-container","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"padding: 20px; text-align: center; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); color: white; border-radius: 10px;"},"children":[{"id":"title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"三角函数的奇妙世界","style":"font-size: 2.5em; margin-bottom: 20px; font-weight: bold;"}},{"id":"subtitle","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"探索角度、边长与比值的美妙关系","style":"font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 30px; opacity: 0.9;"}},{"id":"welcome-image","name":"Image","attrs":{"src":"/images/triangle-wave.svg","alt":"三角函数波形","style":"width: 300px; height: 150px; margin: 20px;"}}],"animations":[{"animations":[{"preset":"fadeIn","params":{"opacity":[0,1]},"duration":1000,"easing":"ease-out"}]}]}}

function.name: new-step
function.arguments: {"description": "三角函数课程介绍 - 欢迎学生进入三角函数的世界", "component": "TrigIntroduction"}

function.arguments: {"name": "RightTriangleBasics", "props": []}

function.arguments: {"component": "RightTriangleBasics", "element": {"id":"triangle-container","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"padding: 30px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; background: #f8f9fa;"},"children":[{"id":"section-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"直角三角形的基础知识","style":"font-size: 2em; color: #333; margin-bottom: 30px; text-align: center;"}},{"id":"triangle-svg","name":"SVG","attrs":{"width":"400","height":"300","viewBox":"0 0 400 300","style":"border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white; margin: 20px;"},"children":[{"id":"triangle-path","name":"polygon","attrs":{"points":"50,250 350,250 350,50","fill":"rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3)","stroke":"#667eea","stroke-width":"3"}},{"id":"angle-a","name":"path","attrs":{"d":"M 320 250 A 30 30 0 0 0 350 220","fill":"none","stroke":"#e74c3c","stroke-width":"2"}},{"id":"angle-label","name":"text","attrs":{"x":"315","y":"235","fill":"#e74c3c","font-size":"16","font-weight":"bold","content":"θ"}},{"id":"side-a","name":"text","attrs":{"x":"200","y":"270","fill":"#333","font-size":"14","text-anchor":"middle","content":"邻边 (a)"}},{"id":"side-b","name":"text","attrs":{"x":"370","y":"150","fill":"#333","font-size":"14","text-anchor":"middle","content":"对边 (b)"}},{"id":"side-c","name":"text","attrs":{"x":"180","y":"130","fill":"#333","font-size":"14","text-anchor":"middle","content":"斜边 (c)"}}]},{"id":"explanation","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"在直角三角形中，我们有三条边：对边、邻边和斜边。三角函数就是描述这些边之间比值关系的函数。","style":"max-width: 500px; text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em; color: #666; line-height: 1.6; margin-top: 20px;"}}],"animations":[{"animations":[{"preset":"slideInUp","params":{"transform":["translateY(50px)","translateY(0)"],"opacity":[0,1]},"duration":800}]}]}}

function.arguments: {"component": "TrigFunctionDefinitions", "element": {"id":"definitions-container","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"padding: 30px; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fff, #f8f9fa);"},"children":[{"id":"main-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"三角函数的定义","style":"font-size: 2.2em; color: #333; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; font-weight: bold;"}},{"id":"functions-grid","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto;"},"children":[{"id":"sin-card","name":"Card","attrs":{"style":"background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border-left: 5px solid #e74c3c;"},"children":[{"id":"sin-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"正弦函数 (sin)","style":"font-size: 1.5em; color: #e74c3c; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 15px;"}},{"id":"sin-formula","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"sin θ = 对边 / 斜边","style":"font-size: 1.3em; background: #fff5f5; padding: 10px; border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; margin: 10px 0;"}},{"id":"sin-description","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"正弦值表示角度的对边与斜边的比值","style":"color: #666; line-height: 1.5;"}}]},{"id":"cos-card","name":"Card","attrs":{"style":"background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border-left: 5px solid #3498db;"},"children":[{"id":"cos-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"余弦函数 (cos)","style":"font-size: 1.5em; color: #3498db; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 15px;"}},{"id":"cos-formula","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"cos θ = 邻边 / 斜边","style":"font-size: 1.3em; background: #f0f8ff; padding: 10px; border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; margin: 10px 0;"}},{"id":"cos-description","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"余弦值表示角度的邻边与斜边的比值","style":"color: #666; line-height: 1.5;"}}]},{"id":"tan-card","name":"Card","attrs":{"style":"background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border-left: 5px solid #f39c12;"},"children":[{"id":"tan-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"正切函数 (tan)","style":"font-size: 1.5em; color: #f39c12; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 15px;"}},{"id":"tan-formula","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"tan θ = 对边 / 邻边","style":"font-size: 1.3em; background: #fffaf0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; margin: 10px 0;"}},{"id":"tan-description","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"正切值表示角度的对边与邻边的比值","style":"color: #666; line-height: 1.5;"}}]}]}],"animations":[{"animations":[{"preset":"fadeIn","params":{"opacity":[0,1]},"duration":1000}]},{"event":"mouseenter","animations":[{"preset":"scale","params":{"transform":["scale(1)","scale(1.05)"]},"duration":300}]},{"event":"mouseleave","animations":[{"preset":"scale","params":{"transform":["scale(1.05)","scale(1)"]},"duration":300}]}]}}

function.name: set-component-root
function.arguments: {"component": "InteractiveTriangle", "element": {"id":"interactive-container","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"padding: 30px; background: #f8f9fa; text-align: center;"},"children":[{"id":"interactive-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"互动三角形 - 观察角度变化对三角函数值的影响","style":"font-size: 1.8em; color: #333; margin-bottom: 30px; font-weight: bold;"}},{"id":"controls-container","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"margin-bottom: 30px;"},"children":[{"id":"angle-label","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"角度：","style":"font-size: 1.2em; margin-right: 10px; color: #333;"}},{"id":"angle-slider","name":"Input","attrs":{"type":"range","min":"10","max":"80","value":"{{ angle || 30 }}","style":"width: 300px; margin: 0 15px;"},"events":{"input":"this.setAttribute('value', event.target.value); this.closest('[data-component]').querySelectorAll('[data-angle]').forEach(el => el.setAttribute('data-angle', event.target.value));"}},{"id":"angle-display","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"{{ angle || 30 }}°","style":"font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: bold; color: #e74c3c; margin-left: 10px;"}}]},{"id":"triangle-and-values","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"display: flex; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 30px;"},"children":[{"id":"dynamic-triangle","name":"SVG","attrs":{"width":"350","height":"280","viewBox":"0 0 350 280","style":"border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white;"},"children":[{"id":"triangle-shape","name":"polygon","attrs":{"points":"{{ '50,250 300,250 300,' + (250 - 200 * Math.tan(((angle || 30) * Math.PI) / 180)) }}","fill":"rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2)","stroke":"#667eea","stroke-width":"2"}},{"id":"angle-arc","name":"path","attrs":{"d":"{{ 'M ' + (300 - 30) + ' 250 A 30 30 0 0 0 300 ' + (250 - 30 * Math.tan(((angle || 30) * Math.PI) / 180)) }}","fill":"none","stroke":"#e74c3c","stroke-width":"2"}},{"id":"angle-text","name":"text","attrs":{"x":"{{ 300 - 40 }}","y":"{{ 250 - 15 }}","fill":"#e74c3c","font-size":"14","content":"{{ (angle || 30) + '°' }}"}}]},{"id":"values-display","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); min-width: 250px;"},"children":[{"id":"values-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"三角函数值","style":"font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: bold; color: #333; margin-bottom: 20px; text-align: center;"}},{"id":"sin-value","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"{{ 'sin ' + (angle || 30) + '° = ' + Math.sin(((angle || 30) * Math.PI) / 180).toFixed(3) }}","style":"font-size: 1.1em; color: #e74c3c; margin: 10px 0; display: block;"}},{"id":"cos-value","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"{{ 'cos ' + (angle || 30) + '° = ' + Math.cos(((angle || 30) * Math.PI) / 180).toFixed(3) }}","style":"font-size: 1.1em; color: #3498db; margin: 10px 0; display: block;"}},{"id":"tan-value","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"{{ 'tan ' + (angle || 30) + '° = ' + Math.tan(((angle || 30) * Math.PI) / 180).toFixed(3) }}","style":"font-size: 1.1em; color: #f39c12; margin: 10px 0; display: block;"}}]}]}],"animations":[{"animations":[{"preset":"slideInLeft","params":{"transform":["translateX(-50px)","translateX(0)"],"opacity":[0,1]},"duration":800}]}]}}

max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95); border-radius: 15px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);"},"children":[{"id":"table-header","name":"TableRow","attrs":{"style":"background: rgba(116, 185, 255, 0.8); color: #333;"},"children":[{"id":"angle-header","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"角度","style":"padding: 15px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em;"}},{"id":"sin-header","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"sin θ","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #f39c12;"}}]},{"id":"angle-45","name":"TableRow","attrs":{"style":"background: #f8f9fa; color: #333; transition: all 0.3s ease;"},"children":[{"id":"angle-45-deg","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"45°","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold;"}},{"id":"sin-45","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"√2/2","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #e74c3c;"}},{"id":"cos-45","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"√2/2","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #3498db;"}},{"id":"tan-45","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"1","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #f39c12;"}}]},{"id":"angle-60","name":"TableRow","attrs":{"style":"background: white; color: #333; transition: all 0.3s ease;"},"children":[{"id":"angle-60-deg","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"60°","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold;"}},{"id":"sin-60","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"√3/2","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #e74c3c;"}},{"id":"cos-60","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"1/2","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #3498db;"}},{"id":"tan-60","name":"TableCell","attrs":{"content":"√3","style":"padding: 15px; text-align: center; color: #f39c12;"}}]}]},{"id":"memory-tip","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"记忆小贴士：观察角度增大时，sin值递增，cos值递减，而tan值快速增长。","style":"text-align: center; margin-top: 30px; font-size: 1.1em; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; font-style: italic;"}}],"animations":[{"animations":[{"preset":"fadeInUp","params":{"transform":["translateY(30px)","translateY(0)"],"opacity":[0,1]},"duration":1000,"delay":200}]}]}}

function.arguments: {"component": "PracticeQuiz", "element": {"id":"quiz-container","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"padding: 30px; background: #f1f2f6; min-height: 500px;"},"children":[{"id":"quiz-title","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"练习时间 - 检验你的学习成果","style":"font-size: 2em; color: #333; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; font-weight: bold;"}},{"id":"question-card","name":"Card","attrs":{"style":"background: white; max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 30px; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);"},"children":[{"id":"question-number","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"题目 1","style":"font-size: 1.2em; color: #667eea; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 20px;"}},{"id":"question-text","name":"Text","attrs":{"content":"在直角三角形中，如果一个锐角为30°，那么sin 30°的值是多少？","style":"font-size: 1.3em; color: #333; margin-bottom: 30px; line-height: 1.6;"}},{"id":"options-container","name":"Container","attrs":{"style":"display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 15px;"},"children":[{"id":"option-a","name":"Button","attrs":{"content":"A. 1/2","style":"padding: 15px 20px; border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white; font-size: 1.1em; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; text-align: left;"},"events":{"click":"document.querySelectorAll('.option').forEach(opt => opt.style.background = 'white'); context.content:
## 三角函数互动课程设计完成！

我为您设计了一个完整的三角函数课程，包含8个循序渐进的教学步骤：

### 📚 课程结构

1. **课程介绍** - 吸引学生注意力，介绍三角函数的魅力
2. **直角三角形基础** - 建立基本概念（对边、邻边、斜边）
3. **三角函数定义** - 详细介绍sin、cos、tan的数学定义
4. **互动三角形** - 学生可以拖动滑块改变角度，实时观察函数值变化
5. **特殊角度** - 学习30°、45°、60°的重要数值
6. **练习测验** - 通过选择题检验学习效果
7. **实际应用** - 展示三角函数在生活中的应用
8. **课程总结** - 回顾学习内容，激励继续学习

### 🎯 教学特色

- **渐进式学习**：从基础概念到实际应用，逐步深入
- **互动体验**：包含可操作的滑块控件，让学生直观感受角度变化
- **视觉效果**：丰富的动画和色彩搭配，提高学习兴趣
- **即时反馈**：练习题提供即时反馈和提示
- **实用性强**：展示三角函数在建筑、航海、物理等领域的应用

### 🔧 技术亮点

- 响应式设计，适配不同设备
- 动画效果增强用户体验
- 实时计算和数据绑定
- 交互式SVG图形
- 鼠标悬停效果

这个课程设计既保持了数学的严谨性，又通过互动和视觉化让抽象概念变得生动有趣，帮助学生更好地理解和掌握三角函数的核心知识。

attrs.style: padding: 20px; text-align: center; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); color: white; border-radius: 10px;

attrs.content: 探索角度、边长与比值的美妙关系

attrs.style: padding: 30px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; background: #f8f9fa;

attrs.content: 直角三角形的基础知识

attrs.style: border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white; margin: 20px;

attrs.content: 在直角三角形中，我们有三条边：对边、邻边和斜边。三角函数就是描述这些边之间比值关系的函数。
attrs.style: max-width: 500px; text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em; color: #666; line-height: 1.6; margin-top: 20px;
font-size: 2.2em; color: #333; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; font-weight: bold;
display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto;
background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border-left: 5px solid #e74c3c;

attrs.content: sin θ = 对边 / 斜边
attrs.style: font-size: 1.3em; background: #fff5f5; padding: 10px; border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; margin: 10px 0;

attrs.content: 正弦值表示角度的对边与斜边的比值

attrs.style: background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border-left: 5px solid #3498db;

attrs.content: cos θ = 邻边 / 斜边
attrs.style: font-size: 1.3em; background: #f0f8ff; padding: 10px; border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; margin: 10px 0;

attrs.content: 余弦值表示角度的邻边与斜边的比值

attrs.style: background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border-left: 5px solid #f39c12;

attrs.content: tan θ = 对边 / 邻边
attrs.style: font-size: 1.3em; background: #fffaf0; padding: 10px; border-radius: 8px; text-align: center; margin: 10px 0;

attrs.content: 正切值表示角度的对边与邻边的比值
互动三角形 - 观察角度变化对三角函数值的影响

attrs.style: display: flex; justify-content: space-around; align-items: center; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 30px;
background: white; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); min-width: 250px;
font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: bold; color: #333; margin-bottom: 20px; text-align: center;

attrs.content: 特殊角度的三角函数值
attrs.style: font-size: 2em; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; font-weight: bold;
width: 100%; max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95); border-radius: 15px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
padding: 15px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em;
padding: 15px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em; color: #e74c3c;
padding: 15px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em; color: #3498db;
padding: 15px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 1.1em; color: #f39c12;
background: white; color: #333; transition: all 0.3s ease;
background: white; color: #333; transition: all 0.3s ease;

attrs.content: 记忆小贴士：观察角度增大时，sin值递增，cos值递减，而tan值快速增长。
attrs.style: text-align: center; margin-top: 30px; font-size: 1.1em; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; font-style: italic;

attrs.content: 练习时间 - 检验你的学习成果
attrs.style: font-size: 2em; color: #333; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; font-weight: bold;
background: white; max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 30px; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);

attrs.content: 在直角三角形中，如果一个锐角为30°，那么sin 30°的值是多少？

attrs.style: padding: 15px 20px; border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white; font-size: 1.1em; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; text-align: left;
padding: 15px 20px; border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white; font-size: 1.1em; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; text-align: left;
padding: 15px 20px; border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white; font-size: 1.1em; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; text-align: left;
padding: 15px 20px; border: 2px solid #ddd; border-radius: 10px; background: white; font-size: 1.1em; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease; text-align: left;
margin-top: 25px; padding: 12px 30px; background: #667eea; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 1.1em; cursor: pointer; display: none;

events.click: if(document.getElementById('option-a').style.background.includes('rgba(212, 237, 218')) { alert('恭喜你！答案正确！sin 30° = 1/2'); } else { alert('答案不正确，请再试一次。正确答案是 A。'); }

attrs.style: margin-top: 30px; padding: 20px; background: #fff3cd; border-left: 4px solid #ffc107; border-radius: 5px;

attrs.content: 回想一下特殊角度表，30°、45°、60°的正弦值分别是多少？

attrs.style: padding: 30px; background: linear-gradient(to right, #667eea, #764ba2); color: white;
font-size: 2.2em; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; font-weight: bold;
display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: 25px; max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto;
background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95); color: #333; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
font-size: 3em; text-align: center; display: block; margin-bottom: 15px;
font-size: 1.4em; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 15px; color: #667eea;

attrs.content: 利用三角函数可以在不直接测量的情况下，通过观测角度和距离来计算建筑物的高度。

attrs.style: background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95); color: #333; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
font-size: 3em; text-align: center; display: block; margin-bottom: 15px;
font-size: 1.4em; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 15px; color: #667eea;

attrs.content: 在航海中，三角函数用于计算方向角、距离和位置，帮助船只准确导航。

attrs.style: background: rgba(255,255,255,0.95); color: #333; padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
font-size: 3em; text-align: center; display: block; margin-bottom: 15px;
font-size: 1.4em; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 15px; color: #667eea;

attrs.content: 声波、光波、电磁波等都可以用三角函数来描述，帮助我们理解波的传播和变化。
实际例子：测量旗杆高度
attrs.style: font-size: 1.6em; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 20px;

attrs.content: 假设你站在距离旗杆底部 20 米的地方，仰视旗杆顶端的角度为 30°。那么旗杆的高度为：

attrs.style: font-size: 1.3em; text-align: center; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; font-weight: bold;
padding: 40px; background: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #ffecd2 0%, #fcb69f 100%); text-align: center;
display: inline-block; background: white; padding: 30px; border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); margin-bottom: 30px;
font-size: 1.5em; color: #2d3436; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 20px; text-align: center;
background: rgba(255,255,255,0.8); padding: 25px; border-radius: 15px; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);

attrs.content: ✓ 直角三角形的基本概念（对边、邻边、斜边）
✓ 特殊角度（30°、45°、60°）的三角函数值
✓ 三角函数在实际生活中的应用
✓ 通过互动操作观察角度变化对函数值的影响

attrs.style: margin-top: 30px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.7); padding: 20px; border-radius: 15px; max-width: 500px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

attrs.content: 继续学习三角函数的图像与性质，探索正弦定理和余弦定理，进一步应用于复杂问题求解。
恭喜你完成了三角函数基础课程！🎉

steps.description: 三角函数课程介绍 - 欢迎学生进入三角函数的世界
直角三角形基础 - 介绍三角形的三条边：对边、邻边、斜边
三角函数定义 - 正弦、余弦、正切函数的数学定义和几何意义
互动三角形 - 让学生通过滑动条改变角度，实时观察三角函数值的变化
特殊角度 - 介绍30°、45°、60°的三角函数值，帮助学生记忆重要的数值
练习测验 - 通过选择题检验学生对特殊角度三角函数值的掌握程度
实际应用 - 展示三角函数在建筑测量、航海导航、物理学等领域的实际应用
课程总结 - 总结本节课的学习内容，给学生成就感并提供下一步学习建议
